attributes.additional_details:
In this Olympic year, and in the British tradition of lighthearted paronomasia , we, the undersigned, want Euston Station to also be officially recognized as, "Whitney Euston Station".

This is something that everyone (I have asked) wants.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Network Rail, which owns the station (unless you're referring to the Tube station, in which case it's a matter for the Mayor of London).
